009package Geometric_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageMapper;
015import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
016import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
017
018public class Map_Twirl implements PlugInFilter {
019        
020        static double alpha = Math.toRadians(43.0);     // angle (43 degrees)
021
022        @Override
023        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
024                return DOES_ALL;
025        }
026
027        @Override
028        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
029                final double xc = 0.5 * ip.getWidth();
030                final double yc = 0.5 * ip.getHeight();
031                final double rmax = Math.sqrt(xc * xc + yc * yc);
032                
033                Mapping2D imap = new Mapping2D() {      // inverse mapping (target to source)
034                        @Override
035                        public Pnt2d applyTo(Pnt2d uv) {
036                                double dx = uv.getX() - xc;
037                                double dy = uv.getY() - yc;
038                                double r = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
039                                if (r < rmax) {
040                                        double beta = Math.atan2(dy, dx) + alpha * (rmax - r) / rmax;
041                                        double x = xc + r * Math.cos(beta);
042                                        double y = yc + r * Math.sin(beta);
043                                        return Pnt2d.from(x, y);
044                                }
045                                else {
046                                        return uv;      // return the original point
047                                }
048                        }
049                };
050                
051                new ImageMapper(imap).map(ip);
052        }
053        
054}
